programme.title: Dead Shot
programme.desc: When a border ambush goes wrong, a retired Irish paramilitary witnesses the fatal shooting of his pregnant wife by an SAS officer. programme.title: The Good Neighbour
programme.desc: A nightmarish evening unfolds for neighbours David and Robert when they accidentally hit a woman on her bike and flee the scene. While David is increasingly plagued by feelings of guilt, Robert shows no remorse and becomes overbearing and possessive. When David meets the victim's sister, he submits to a reckless passion and underlying sense of redemption, before realising Robert will do unspeakable things to protect their secret. programme.title: The King's Speech
programme.desc: Oscar-winning historical drama starring Colin Firth, Helena Bonham Carter and Geoffrey Rush. programme.title: Gunpowder Milkshake
programme.desc: In her turbulent life as a professional assassin, Scarlet was cruelly forced to abandon her daughter Sam and go on the run. Years later, despite the estrangement, Sam has also grown up into a cold-blooded hitwoman. After a high-stakes mission spins out of control, Sam has no choice but to go rogue. programme.desc: The first sci-fi adventure movie based on the cult TV series, starring William Shatner and Leonard Nimoy. programme.title: Star Trek III: The Search for Spock

Barely surviving the wrath of Khan, the battle-scarred starship Enterprise limps back to Earth, saved only by the sacrifice of the late Captain Spock. programme.desc: Young, uptight and unsuccessful English writer Henry's latest novel sells poorly. programme.title: Best of F1 2023
programme.desc: Rekindling memories of an unforgettable 2021 season, Lewis Hamilton has pole position with Max Verstappen joining the Mercedes man on the front row at the 2023 Hungarian Grand Prix. (23.07).

programme.title: Best of F1 2023
programme.desc: The 2023 Belgian Grand Prix sees the third of six F1 Sprints this season. In a 100km dash, the drivers race all the way to the chequered flag for a haul of championship points. (29.07).

programme.title: Best of F1 2023
programme.desc: Steeped in history, Spa is set for the next chapter to be written as the lights go out at the 2023 Belgian Grand Prix. Last year's race saw Max Verstappen head a Red Bull one-two. (30.07).

programme.title: Best of F1 2023
programme.desc: Fresh from a summer break, Formula 1 returns to a sea of orange for the 2023 Dutch Grand Prix, as Red Bull's Max Verstappen makes his homecoming as the world championship leader. (27.08).

programme.title: Best of F1 2023
programme.desc: Known as the Temple of Speed, Monza sets the stage for the 2023 Italian Grand Prix - the same stage Max Verstappen topped just a year ago. (03.09).

programme.title: Singapore F1 GP Highlights
programme.desc: Among the most physically demanding races on the calendar - this is the Singapore Grand Prix. Carlos Sainz starts from pole position and George Russell joins him on the front row. (17.09).

programme.title: Japanese F1 GP Highlights
programme.desc: The 2023 Japanese Grand Prix starts here. Ahead of the McLarens, Max Verstappen returned to his imperious best to lock in pole. His Red Bull team-mate Sergio Perez starts from P5. (24.09).

programme.title: Qatar F1 GP: Sprint
programme.desc: The 2023 Qatar Grand Prix sees the fourth F1 Sprint of the season. Oscar Piastri starts from P1. (07.10).

programme.title: Qatar F1 GP Highlights
programme.desc: Two years on from the inaugural Qatar Grand Prix, Lusail welcomes F1 racing once more. George Russell and Lewis Hamilton follow the newly crowned world champion Max Verstappen. (08.10).

programme.title: U.S. F1 GP: Sprint
programme.desc: The 2023 United States Grand Prix sees the fifth F1 Sprint this season. Putting Friday behind him, Max Verstappen starts from P1 with Charles Leclerc and Lewis Hamilton behind. (21.10).

programme.title: U.S. F1 GP Highlights
programme.desc: After taking Sprint victory, Max Verstappen starts from sixth for the 2023 United States Grand Prix. Charles Leclerc and Lando Norris are on the front row with Lewis Hamilton third. (22.10).

programme.title: Best of F1 2023
programme.desc: It's race day at the 2023 Mexico City Grand Prix. Taking place at the Autodromo Hermanos Rodriguez, Charles Leclerc starts in pole with his Ferrari teammate Carlos Sainz in second. (29.10).

programme.title: Chelsea v Tottenham 1993/94
programme.desc: We revisit this seven-goal thriller between Chelsea and Tottenham at Stamford Bridge. Mark Stein scored a last-gasp penalty to snatch all three points for Glenn Hoddle's side.

programme.title: Man City v Man Utd - 1993/94
programme.desc: We take a look back at this clash between the two Manchester rivals. City raced into a two-goal lead but it was the visitors who took the points after Eric Cantona's late winner.

programme.title: Everton v Liverpool 2000/01
programme.desc: Take a look back at one of the Premier League's classic derby matches between Everton and Liverpool. The points looked to be shared before Gary McAllister stepped up late on.

programme.desc: We revisit West Ham's trip to Stamford Bridge to face Chelsea in the 2002/03 Premier League season. Paulo Di Canio's brace earned the visitors their first win of the season.

programme.desc: Revisit Aston Villa and Chelsea's five-goal classic from the 2003/4 Premier League. Villa were pushing for a UEFA Cup spot while Chelsea hoped to keep pace with leaders Arsenal.

programme.title: Tottenham v Leicester City 2003/04
programme.desc: We take a look back at this classic Premier League clash between Tottenham and Leicester. The visitors thought they had snatched the win until Jermain Defoe's late leveller.

programme.desc: Take a look back at this classic Premier League clash between Manchester United and Liverpool. Dimitar Berbatov stole the show with a hat-trick for Sir Alex Ferguson's side.

programme.title: Man United v Newcastle 2012/13
programme.desc: Take a look back at this pulsating seven-goal thriller between Manchester United and Newcastle. Javier Hernandez was the hero as his stoppage time goal sealed victory for United.

programme.title: Everton v Liverpool 2013/14
programme.desc: We revisit the 2013/14 Premier League classic between Everton and Liverpool at Goodison Park. This pulsating Merseyside derby is regarded as one of the finest in living memory.

programme.title: F1 Highlights
programme.desc: Rekindling memories of an unforgettable 2021 season, Lewis Hamilton has pole position with Max Verstappen joining the Mercedes man on the front row at the 2023 Hungarian Grand Prix.

programme.title: F1 Highlights
programme.desc: The 2023 Belgian Grand Prix sees the third of six F1 Sprints this season. In a 100km dash, the drivers race all the way to the chequered flag for a haul of championship points.

programme.title: F1 Highlights
programme.desc: Steeped in history, Spa is set for the next chapter to be written as the lights go out at the 2023 Belgian Grand Prix. Last year's race saw Max Verstappen head a Red Bull one-two.

programme.title: F1 Highlights
programme.desc: Fresh from a summer break, Formula 1 returns to a sea of orange for the 2023 Dutch Grand Prix, as Red Bull's Max Verstappen makes his homecoming as the world championship leader.

programme.title: F1 Highlights

programme.desc: Among the most physically demanding races on the calendar - this is the Singapore Grand Prix. One of F1's strongest street performers Sergio Perez won here in last year.

programme.title: F1 Highlights
programme.desc: Highlights of the 2023 Japanese Grand Prix. Last year, this race proved to be a pivotal one in the championship, as Max Verstappen became a two-time world champion at Suzuka.

programme.title: F1 Highlights
programme.desc: The 2023 Qatar Grand Prix sees the fourth of six F1 Sprints this season. In a 100km dash, the drivers race to the chequered flag for a haul of world championship points.

programme.title: F1 Highlights
programme.desc: Two years on from the inaugural Qatar Grand Prix, Losail International Circuit welcomes Formula 1 racing once more. Lewis Hamilton took the chequered flag in P1 here back in 2021.

programme.title: F1 Highlights
programme.desc: The 2023 United States Grand Prix sees the fifth F1 Sprint this season. Putting Friday behind him, Max Verstappen starts from P1 with Charles Leclerc and Lewis Hamilton behind.

programme.title: F1 Highlights
programme.desc: After taking Sprint victory, Max Verstappen starts from sixth for the 2023 United States Grand Prix. Charles Leclerc and Lando Norris are on the front row with Lewis Hamilton third.

programme.title: F1 Highlights
programme.desc: Seventy-one laps of the Autodromo Hermanos Rodriguez start here as the lights go out at the 2023 Mexico City Grand Prix. Max Verstappen has won the previous two races here.
